snippet: Facing its former coach, Pia Sundhage, for the first time, the United States women’s team came from behind to tie Sweden, 1-1.
abstract: United States women's soccer team ties Sweden, 1-1, advancing to Algarve Cup final.
lead_paragraph: Facing its former coach, Pia Sundhage, for the first time, the United States women’s team came from behind to tie Sweden, 1-1.

headline.seo: United States Rallies to Tie Its Former Coach
headline.main: United States Rallies to Tie Its Former Coach
